Author: Jcga
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: "Dether Development Transparency‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäPart 3-2 Envisioning an affiliate program on top of Ethereum   2/ How does it work?  With Dether, for every seller or shop, we will have an affiliate field and an affiliate balance. For every fee burned on the app by this user, half of it will go directly to their affiliates. All of these mechanisms will take place on the smart contract level, where an affiliate will have the possibility to withdraw the affiliate balance from his affiliate.""   => https://medium.com/@DETHER/dether-development-transparency-part-3-99a99166d515   Or     Go Dether !

Author: Jcga
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: "3/ How can you become an affiliate?  We will also develop a front-end app to allow people to easily send a referral link. This system could also be used by front-end applications aiming to bring new users of their own. With an application on top of the protocol and for every seller they will bring onboard, the application will make direct profit.  We can also imagine an application, which allows people to register, and also refer new users. And we plan to have different levels of referral inside the protocol, with part of the new affiliate going directly to the first affiliate. We will create our own open source front-end application and encourage anyone to fork it or to plug it to their system, modify it and bring new users onboard on the protocol on their own and make money from it. Everyone will benefit, as we want to create this standard for OTC trades and payments in-shop.  We are conscious that it won‚Äôt be possible alone, so with this system, everyone will be directly incentivized to make it more solid."   => https://medium.com/@DETHER/dether-development-transparency-part-3-99a99166d515   Or

Author: elegant_joylin
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Thank you for your constructive criticism. Before anything else, I would like to explain it.  When I made this, the announcement was taken from https://crowdin.com/project/dether_io o Dether Filipino website, where you can see all the documents about Dether and other languages there, status and other activities. But I have made some revision that was overlooked to be translated in English. This is a group effort, there is main translator there, contributors, comments/suggestions, vote for the translated languages and approval of any suggestion. But, being the translator of the ANN here, i'm still responsible for all the text written therein. You have a point about the title, I will consult this first before making any action.  I'm a positive person that embrace failures, that despite having several failures, I try and try and try again. Because in failures, you will learn, at your foundation become firm and stable. Example, is Jack Ma, who from the early age have experienced several failures you can't imagine. Today, he is one of the successful billionaire in the world.

Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Dear Dether community,  Today we are happy to inform you that we‚Äôre releasing the alpha version of dether.js  It‚Äôs a javascript library to interact with the Dether protocol. It‚Äôll enable any Dapp to easily add cryptocurrency cash-in and cash-out services to their Dapp.  First example, we have just released a bot on top of Toshi, Coinbase‚Äôs browser for the Ethereum network. Dether.io Bot finds for you the closest ether seller around you based on your location.  Check it out: https://medium.com/@DETHER/dether-development-transparency-part-2-723222a1c222

Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Dether lands on BuzzFeed  ‚ÄúSome applications, like Dether, are exchanges that act as bank accounts as well. At cryptocurrency compliant brick and mortar stores, you can use Dether to make purchases for common, physical items using Ether - the coin for the common cryptocurrency network Ethereum. You can also pay other Dether users in Ether for goods and services, creating PayPal-like services right off the bat.‚Äù   READ MORE: https://www.buzzfeed.com/rahejaweb/you-donat-need-to-understand-blockchain-to-profi-2y1pw?utm_term=.qyjXGxvkvQ#.rgMJ01DmDo

Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption

Users can download the Alpha version of Dether to spend Ethereum seamlessly at approved stores using their smartphone. They could pay other Dether users easily using the app, serving a bulk of typical bank-account features. The logo is a stylized location icon to indicate Dether global reach - where users can pay and trade with people worldwide without having to transfer currencies via multiple channels or paying for expensive money transfers."

Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Dether and Blueshyft Partner to List 1,200 Shops in Australia, Where You Can Buy Ether Over the Counter.   You can use Dether‚Äôs mobile app to locate 1,200 local retailers, where you can buy ether using cash.  Access to ether in Australia just became easier today for Australian residents. Dether is happy to partner with Blueshyft, one of the largest retail networks in Australia, comprising over 1,200 local retailers supporting ether for over the counter exchanges.  Using Dether‚Äôs decentralized mobile app, users can easily locate over 1,200 shops around them, where they can deposit cash instantly to buy ether.   Full article on Medium.

Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Hi xiphoidbond, √êTR tokens serve two main goals: ‚Ä¢   √êTR is the key token needed to unlock additional features and ensure better visibility on the Dether map. As a teller or a physical store, staking √êTR tokens is required in order to increase his or her visibility to buyers on the Dether map. When multiple sellers or physical shops who have √êTR tokens are competing for a trading zone on the Dether map, an auction system chooses the winner for a determined period of time. ‚Ä¢   Launch an organic referral program to foster Dether‚Äôs ecosystem growth all over the world.

Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption

Author: mehdi_dether
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Hi, having a premium zone indexing system allow to avoid having a spammed map, it will help to keep a quality map. Imagine on big cities where you could have a lot of tellers around, having an auction system to get the exclusivity on a zone, will help to maitain a quality of services. You will see lower number of teller but more willing to sell actively their Ether on this area. So for the buyer side its even better. Its like taxi licence plate, less offer but premium offer. And I don't understand your point when you say it's contradict with decentralised? Every part of this system will only be ruled by the smart contract. Our mobile application will only read what's on the smart contract directly.

Author: Seccour
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Dether, the World‚Äôs First Peer-to-Peer Ether Network, Will Change the Game for Ethereum Mass Adoption   Powered by Ethereum smart contracts, Dether is a revolutionary new way for anyone on Earth to buy ether using cash and spend it at physical stores nearby. Unlike existing solutions, a user doesn't need a bank account, only a mobile phone with internet access.  While the Ethereum blockchain opens the doors to a trustless digital world where its applications don‚Äôt have any kind of censorship, fraud or third party interference, its hurdle is mass adoption. Buying ether is currently a long and difficult process. Dether wants to change that.  For the first time, a decentralized application (Dapp) is creating a worldwide ecosystem of ether buyers, sellers and physical stores willing to trade ether for fiat cash and accept it as a means of payment.   Full article on the CoinTelegraph website.

Author: Seccour
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Creating a peer-to-peer bridge between fiat currency and Ethereum cryptocurrency   With Dether, any ether owner can become a teller and have an accessible way to make money. Ether sellers can become mobile ATMs by being on the Dether map and selling ether for fiat currency anywhere in the world at any time.  Users interested in buying ether can discover ether sellers near them on the Dether map, the app‚Äôs built-in location system. Users can view a seller‚Äôs ether/fiat rate and fees and chat anonymously via an encrypted peer-to-peer messaging solution to agree on the trading conditions and the meeting point to carry out the exchange.  On the Dether map, users can even locate physical stores that accept ether as a means of payment, or who wish to trade ether for cash. This represents a unique opportunity for merchants. As Ethereum popularity explodes across the globe, more and more businesses are accepting ether.  ‚ÄúOur mission is to break barriers to foster Ethereum mass adoption,‚Äù said Hamid Benyahia, Dether co-founder. Frustrated at the fact that his family members in Algeria, restricted by the Algerian dinar, weren‚Äôt able to interact with the Ethereum blockchain, he searched for a solution that would make Ethereum accessible to anyone on Earth. Dether was born.   Full article on the The Merkle website.

Author: ab_dether
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Ethereum take off? Yes, it‚Äôs time!  When launching a business or a digital product, having the right time to market is crucial for its success. Some would even speak of the right ‚Äútoken to market,‚Äù with tokens launched on top of the Ethereum blockchain. A business‚Äôs idea could sound great, but if it‚Äôs not the right time to do it ‚Ä¶ no success will come of it. Today, blockchain technology, and more specifically Ethereum, is still facing a mass adoption issue in the world. To a certain extent, it is linked to common economic, political and social issues shared by diverse countries. That‚Äôs the reason why the Dether team has conducted a market study for launching the world‚Äôs first mobile Dapp that enables any individual to buy ether with cash and spend it at physical stores. We came to the conclusion that all the lights are green to launch a ground-breaking blockchain app in a favorable economic context.  This blog post is an extract of Dether‚Äôs upcoming white paper, underlying who will be our early adopters, early majority and late majority and what strategy we will adopt.   READ MORE: https://medium.com/@DETHER/ethereum-take-off-yes-its-time-85a92a681fe0

Body: Hey I like the idea, but I have a couple of questions. Without charging fees, how will Dether be profitable? If the product isn't profitable, giving money to it wouldn't be investing, it would be more like donating.  Second, is handling transactions like this on a mobile device riskier than on a pc? How are you going to improve security?  Thanks! I'll definitely stay tuned to this project.

Author: Seccour
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Regarding the potential fees, it will be announced later on.  And no it's not riskier than on a pc as long as you take a lot of care of what you're downloading and installing on your phone. Like on a pc. If you download untrusted apps, then if anything bad such as a virus end up it your device it will be your responsibility. But no matter what, the app will be designed to be as secure as possible. A seed will be generated at the start of the application which will then be encrypted and stored on the device where the app is installed.

Author: Seccour
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Dether: Breaking Barriers To Ethereum Mass Adoption   Dether will make it possible for anyone to buy and sell Ether with cash, and to spend it in nearby shops. The company plans to achieve this with a peer-to-peer network they are currently building. The Alpha is expected to be released in Q3 2017.  I am strongly convinced that Ethereum can only go mainstream if several ‚Äúkiller apps‚Äù are developed on top of it. The internet needed a search engine to structure all its data. Ethereum needs a platform that enables everybody to acquire Ether.  This is where Dether comes into play.  As this project is of great interest for me, I was lucky enough to interview Hamid, one of the co-founders of Dether.   Full interview on the CoinNoob website.

Author: Seccour
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: The Missing Piece to Make Cryptocurrency a True ‚ÄúPeer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System‚Äù   Decentralization is at the heart of blockchain; it is even viewed, in the words of Vitalik Buterin¬π as ‚Äúblockchain‚Äôs entire raison d‚Äô√™tre.‚Äù While, Bitcoin paved the way for the first use case of blockchain technology; an ‚Äúelectronic peer-to-peer cash system‚Äù¬≤ as described by Satoshi Nakamoto, Ethereum enables anyone to build unstoppable applications: a trustless digital world where its applications don‚Äôt have any kind of censorship, fraud or third party interference. A world where you can participate in a democratic and autonomous organization without previously knowing any participants.  In fact, when one buys ether (Ethereum cryptocurrency), it then becomes possible to access and interact with the Ethereum blockchain. While we‚Äôre living in an important time in history, where blockchain technology, and especially Ethereum, is changing the world, one of its greatest challenges remains mass adoption.   Full article on Medium.

Author: Seccour
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Why on Earth Would These People buy Ether?   Knowing your target audience should be everyone‚Äôs top business obsession. Since the beginning of our journey at Dether, we‚Äôve always asked ourselves: who are we targeting? What problems are these people facing? To what extent does the situation differ from one region to another? How are we going to reach them? These questions seem simple; yet, they are crucial for our success! It has led us to meet with our potential community of users to better understand their needs and frustrations, and this has proven to be a golden opportunity to better shape Dether.  After publishing Dether‚Äôs market study stressing our go-to-market strategy, the Dether team is happy to present a brief introduction of our target audience! This is not a complete overview of Dether‚Äôs target audience, but it gives a better understanding of who we are targeting. Although we‚Äôve talked to many potential users who‚Äôve shown us many different motivations for their interest in cryptocurrency, we‚Äôve decided to pick four personas of users that inspired us. Their photos are not shown, and their names have been changed in order to preserve their anonymity.   Full article on Medium.

Author: Seccour
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Dether releases White Paper on how to break barriers to Ethereum mass adoption.    Today is a big day. The Dether team is incredibly happy and excited to release Dether's white paper!   As you may know, the Dether team has been working hard for months to build the alpha version of the world's first decentralized mobile app that enables anyone on Earth to buy ether using cash and spend it at physical stores.   But before releasing Dether's alpha, we wanted to take some time through this white paper to lay out our vision and our roadmap and to give you more details about how Dether will be built.           We wanted to thank everyone who has helped in the release of Dether's white paper. For this first version, we'd be thrilled to have everyone's feedback.   Please share and forward to your network  Thanks, The Dether team

Author: Seccour
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Translation of the Dether Website    Hello everyone!  We are launching the translation of our website. We want to encourage as many people as possible to participate in the joint effort to translate the website.  The launch of our site dether.io has been a great success and we thank you! Let's make it even more awesome by widening the target audience! Chinese, Russian and Korean translators are the most welcome as the language barrier seems the most significant here but other translation are welcome too!  You don't have to be a qualified translator to perform the task, all you need to have are writing skills so that you can provide a correct, fluent-to-read text for speakers of your language.    How to translate:  Go to the Dether website. Register to get access to translation module. If your language is not present on the list, please send a PM to Seccour or ask us in the Dether Slack channel and we will add it to the project. Translation is divided to subpages, which means that some content needs to be translated multiple times but you can do it fast by selecting existing translations from the memory. Once finished, it is recommended to proofread the translation (voting). If there's only one person for a language, we can do without it, however. If you have any questions regarding crowdin, the best way to address them is via crowdin or our slack, where you can contact us as a project owner.     Thank you everybody to be a part of this adventure !

Author: ab_dether
Title: [ANN] [√êTR] Dether - Breaking barriers to Ethereum mass adoption
Body: Hi everyone and welcome to Dether's Bitcointalk ANN!  This is Abdelhamid, cofounder at Dether, the world's first Dapp that enables anyone on Earth to buy ether using cash and spend it at physical stores.  Dether is powered by Ethereum smart contracts and available on any smartphone.  Our mission is very simple: break barriers to Ethereum adoption! Buying ether is currently a long and difficult process. It takes time and costs money. Central institutions still play a major role. More than 2 billion adults remain excluded from Ethereum by being unbanked. And the last mile issue has yet to be solved.  That's the reason why we are launching a fully peer-to-peer and decentralized solution.  We're a team of 7 Blockchain and Ethereum passionnates. We're working on an Alpha that will come out this summer.  We just opened our Slack to our community, please join us in participating in the next killer app for Ethereum mass adoption!  http://dether.io http://slack.dether.io   And for more information, here is our Introducing Blogpost: https://medium.com/@DETHER/introducing-dether-enabling-anyone-on-earth-to-buy-ether-with-cash-and-spend-it-at-physical-stores-fe23ad6084c4  Cheers!
